body: A friend and me found out, how to strategically use the invisible fire to theoretically make a really good defence by totally covering the plains around the monument with invisible fire. Would it count as glitch abusing or just be another strategy to defend a monument? We aren't quite sure and thought it betetr to ask first, before actually doing it :) Another good thing about the defence, is also that the fire doesn'T end.
